TopicTitle: PSA: Don't forget oxidant if you're relying on Vernor RCS engines

Articles.Content: I came to the realisation that Vernor engines will require oxidant and this is a consideration when building a vessel using the nuclear engines and carrying mainly liquid fuel.

I have yet to make my LV-N observations with only using liquid Fuel but your have a very valid point there.

It also would help if you could choose what Poison you carry around in a tank so you have one tank for every size but you can switch between LF/O - LiquidFuel-only - Oxidizer only - Monoprop - Xenon and so on.

Right now when you choose an LF/O-Tank and empty it out of Oxidizer to only bring up the Liquid Fuel, it is still quite heavy as it is actually half empty.

**There is a mod for it, I know.**

**But i would love to use the Radial RCS-Tanks as LF/O-Tanks in the Stock game** ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
